creator: McClatchy
descriptionHtml:
Connect wherever you are to The Charlotte Observer for news from around the Carolinas.

Get the latest local and breaking news from the seven-county region of Mecklenburg, Union, Cabarrus, York, Iredell, Gaston and Catawba. The Charlotte Observer reports on the local topics you care about, including banking, politics, education, weather, traffic, crime, sports, arts and entertainment, food, faith, health, and national news. Charlotteobserver.com brings you real-time updates on news from Charlotte, Concord, Fort Mill, Monroe, Lake Norman, Gastonia, Mooresville, Hickory and Rock Hill, and from communities such as Ballantyne, University City, Mint Hill, Steele Creek and more.

Are you a Carolina Panthers, Charlotte Hornets or NASCAR fan? Are you a 49er, Tar Heel or Blue Devil? Do you get excited for the Friday night lights of high school football? Our app will keep you connected to your favorite teams and favorite sports writers.

The Charlotte Observer covers North Carolina and South Carolina like no other media in our area. Wherever you go, stay connected to news that’s important to you.

Features of the app include:

• Breaking news alerts and real-time updates.
• Local and national video from dozens of news sources, including Observer staff.
• Stunning photo galleries of news coverage and events.
• Charlotte Observer opinions, editorials and columns you love.
• Local and national obituaries.
• Ability to share stories and galleries on Facebook, Twitter or by email.
• Ability to read comments and join the conversation.
• EXTRAS: Your subscription to The Charlotte Observer app comes with complimentary web access to the Charlotte Observer site, as well as access to the eEdition. Subscribe to the app now and get your first month for $1.99. Monthly and annual subscriptions are available for $15.99 per month or $159.99 per year and include unlimited digital access to The Charlotte Observer app, eEdition and The Charlotte Observer website.


Your subscription will automatically renew each month or year 24-hours before the end of the current period, and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google Play account settings.

Read our Privacy policy here: http://www.charlotteobserver.com/customer-service/privacy-policy/

Read our Terms of Service here: http://www.charlotteobserver.com/customer-service/terms-of-service/

• Charlotte Observer opinions, editorials and columns you love.
• Local and national obituaries.
• Ability to share stories and galleries on Facebook, Twitter or by email.
• An app-native eEdition of the printed newspaper, including 60 additional pages in the ExtraExtra section.

descriptionShort: Connect any time to The Charlotte Observer for news from around the Carolinas.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new:
• Your news, your way: Choose between app or eEdition as the default view.
• Customize your Home screen with Topic Selector for a quick glance at the content you care about most.
• eEdition has been rebuilt with improved sharing and easier puzzle printing.
• New look and feel, including new fonts for better legibility.
• Text size can now be adjusted directly in the story page.
• New “My Content” section allows quick access to bookmarks and saved eEditions.

descriptionShort: Connect any time to The Charlotte Observer for news from around the Carolinas.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's new:
• Search: You will now be able to perform keyword searches on current content within the app including native articles and eEdition pages
• Performance improvements
• Reading enhancement: The navigation bar at the top of article pages will move out of view when scrolled down, then return when swiping up

Resolved bugs:
• Fixes an issue where a reader couldn’t set the eEdition as the first section tab during initial app setup

• Overall performance and stability improvements
• For in-app purchase subscribers, added a button that links to the Google Play subscription center for easier payment management.
• The app should no longer send readers to the first page of an eEdition issue when closing an eEdition article view on devices.

title: The Charlotte Observer

creator: McClatchy
descriptionHtml:
Connect wherever you are to The Charlotte Observer for news from around the Carolinas.

Get the latest local and breaking news from the seven-county region of Mecklenburg, Union, Cabarrus, York, Iredell, Gaston and Catawba. The Charlotte Observer reports on the local topics you care about, including banking, politics, education, weather, traffic, crime, sports, arts and entertainment, food, faith, health, and national news. The Charlotte Observer brings you real-time updates on news from Charlotte, Concord, Fort Mill, Monroe, Lake Norman, Gastonia, Mooresville, Hickory and Rock Hill, and from communities such as Ballantyne, University City, Mint Hill, Steele Creek and more.

Are you a Carolina Panthers, Charlotte Hornets or NASCAR fan? Are you a 49er, Tar Heel or Blue Devil? Do you get excited for the Friday night lights of high school football? Our app will keep you connected to your favorite teams and favorite sports writers.

The Charlotte Observer covers North Carolina and South Carolina like no other media in our area. Wherever you go, stay connected to news that’s important to you.

Features of the app include:

• Breaking news alerts and real-time updates.
• Local and national video from dozens of news sources, including Observer staff.
• Stunning photo galleries of news coverage and events.
• Charlotte Observer opinions, editorials and columns you love.
• Local and national obituaries.
• Ability to share stories and galleries on Facebook, Twitter or by email.
• An app-native eEdition of the printed newspaper, including 60 additional pages in the ExtraExtra section.

Read our Privacy policy here: https://www.charlotteobserver.com/customer-service/privacy-policy/text-only/

Read our Terms of Service here: https://www.charlotteobserver.com/customer-service/terms-of-service/text-only/

For California Residents: To learn more about managing your sharing preferences and Do Not Sell My Info rights visit https://www.charlotteobserver.com/customer-service/privacy-policy/text-only/#notice_california
descriptionShort: Connect any time to The Charlotte Observer for news from around the Carolinas.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improvements to the push notification service

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• eEdition page browser navigation: Fixes a bug some users encountered where if you tapped a thumbnail in the eEdition page browser, the app would load a blank screen.
• Minor stability improvements.
